content.question: The mass and radius of Earth are <math alttext="uppercase M sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="uppercase R sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively.
